title: How to Make Chocolate Banana Bread

steps.headline: Sift the flour and baking powder into a bowl and add the caster sugar.
Melt the butter and chocolate in a double boiler.
Combine bananas, eggs, vanilla, and chocolate mixture in a separate bowl.
steps.description: Add this to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.

steps.headline: Grease the loaf pan with extra butter or cooking oil.
Pour into the loaf pan and bake for approximately one hour.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/356ºF  Prepare loaf pan.  Sift the flour and baking powder into a bowl and add the caster sugar.  Melt the butter and chocolate in a double boiler.  Combine bananas, eggs, vanilla, and chocolate mixture in a separate bowl. Add this to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Grease the loaf pan with extra butter or cooking oil.  Pour into the loaf pan and bake for approximately one hour.  Dust with icing sugar.  Finished.
